name: A Break in the Action
rules: Exhaust any number of ready heroes and allies in your party. Each of those characters heals 2 damage from itself.

name: Amplify Magic
rules: Attach to target friendly hero or ally. ; Ongoing: If damage would be healed from attached character, that much damage +2 is healed instead.
flavour: Those who exhibit twice the bravery often need twice the healing.

name: Anesthetic Poison
rules: Attach to target hero or ally that was dealt combat damage by your hero this turn.;Ongoing: When attached character becomes exhausted, its controller discards a card.
flavour: Poison the body, and you'll numb the mind. - The Assassin's Creed, Chapter 6

name: Arcane Blast
rules: You pay 1 less for each other card named Arcane Blast in your graveyard to play Arcane Blast.;Your hero deals 3 Arcane Damage to target Hero or Ally.
flavour: Each blast of arcane power strikes its target more quickly than the last.

name: Aspect of the Monkey
rules: Ongoing: Discard a card -> Opposing allies have -2 ATK while in combat with your hero this turn. Use only once per turn.
flavour: Monkey see, monkey dodge.

name: Avenger's Shield
rules: Protection Hero Required;Exhaust up to three target heroes and/or allies, and each of them can't ready during its controller's next step. Your hero deals 1 holy damage to each of those characters.
flavour: Those who oppose the shield must yield.

name: Battle Preparations
rules: Allies can't attack until after your next turn.

name: Berserker Rage
rules: You may destroy any number of abilities attached to your hero.;Ongoing: Your hero has +1 ATK while attacking for each 5 damage on it.
flavour: Nothing incites the killing urge like the taste of one's own blood.

name: Binding Heal
rules: Your hero heals 5 damage from itself and 5 damage from another target hero or ally.

name: Blessing of Divinity
rules: Attach to target ally. ; Ongoing: Attached ally has +1 ATK and +1 health. ; When attached ally becomes exhausted, your hero heals 1 damage from it.
flavour: Go forward with the strength of heroes, and let foulness break itself upon the power of your mandate.

name: Bloodlust
rules: Horde Hero Required; Heroes and allies in your party have +2 ATK while attacking heroes this turn.
flavour: It's scary even when someone other than an ogre mage casts it. - Moala Stonebinder

name: Call of the Wild
rules: Ongoing: When your hero attacks, it deals 1 melee damage to target opposing hero.;Your hero is in cat form. (+1 ATK while attacking. Destroy this card when you strike with a weapon or play a non-Feral ability.)
flavour: To heed such a call is to forsake man-made weaponry in favor of a more feral response.

name: Chain Heal
rules: Target up to three heroes and/or allies. Your hero heals 3, 2, and 1 damage from them, respectively.
reprinted: War of the Elements,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring),Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall),Class Starter Deck 2010

name: Corpse Run
rules: Ongoing: When an ally in your party is destroyed during your turn, you may put it from its owner's graveyard into his hand at end of turn.
flavour: Nothing is certain except death and repair costs.

name: Deadly Brew
rules: Choose a Poison attached to a hero or ally. Search your deck for a card with the same name and attach it to that character.

name: Death Coil
rules: Remove target ally in an opponent's party from the game. At the start of your next turn, that opponent puts that ally into play under his control, and your hero deals 2 shadow damage to it.
flavour: Death is not something you can run from when it comes for you.

name: Defensive Breach
rules: Destroy target equipment.
flavour: Destroy an enemy's defenses, and he is helpless before you.

name: Demoralizing Roar
rules: Ongoing: Opposing allies have -2 ATK.;Your hero is in bear form. (Has Protector. Destroy this card when you strike with a weapon or play a non-Feral ability.)

name: Devastate
rules: Protection Hero Required; Your hero deals melee damage to target hero or ally equal to the ATK of one of your Melee weapons. This turn, that character must attack if able and can attack only your hero if able.

name: Divine Illumination
rules: Holy Hero Required; ; You pay 1 less to play abilities this turn, to a minimum of 1. ; Draw a card.

name: Dragon's Breath
rules: Fire Hero Required;Your hero deals 3 fire damage divided as you choose to any number of target heroes and/or allies. A character dealt damage this way loses all powers this turn.
flavour: Seared to imperfection.

name: Earth Shield
rules: Restoration Hero Required; Earth Shield enters play with four shield counters. ; Ongoing: When your hero is dealt combat damage, remove a shield counter, and your hero heals 3 damage from itself. When the last counter is removed, destroy Earth Shield.

name: Earth Shock
rules: Your hero deals 4 nature damage to target hero or ally. If you targeted a hero, you may interrupt an ability card played by its controller.
flavour: Concussion beats concentration.

name: Envenom
rules: As an additional cost to play Envenom, remove up to five combo cards in your graveyard from the game. Your hero deals that much nature damage to target hero or ally, or double that much if the targeted character has a Poison attached to it.

name: Explosions!
rules: Your hero deals 2 fire damage divided as you choose to any number of target allies.
flavour: We've got explosives!

name: Filthy Tricks
rules: Ongoing: Cards in your graveyard are Combo cards.
flavour: All's fair in war and thievery.

name: Fire Elemental Totem
rules: Ongoing: When Fire Elemental Totem enters play, put a Fire Elemental ally token with 2 ATK, 1 health, and Ferocity into play. ; (Totems can be attacked or targeted like allies.)

name: Fizzle
rules: Interrupt target ability card with cost 3 or less.
flavour: It's the last thing you'll never say.

name: Flight Form
rules: Ongoing: Your hero is Untargetable.;When you play an ability or your hero attacks, destroy Flight Form.
flavour: A druid is never out of her element.

name: Force of Nature
rules: Balance Hero Required;Put three Treant ally tokens with 1 ATK, 1 health, and Ferocity into play.
flavour: They are the fruit sprung from the seeds of service to nature.

name: Freezing Trap
rules: Trap (You may exhaust your defending hero rather than pay this card's cost.);Attach to target attacking ally and remove it from combat.;Ongoing: Attached ally can't attack or protect and loses all powers.

name: Frost Funnel
rules: Your hero deals 1 frost damage to each of up to two target heroes and/or allies. A character dealt damage this way can't attack this turn.
flavour: When you're charging at a mage, the last ten steps can take an eternity.

name: Garrote
rules: Play only if your hero has Stealth. ;Attach to target hero or ally. ;Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 1 melee damage to attached character. The controller of a character dealt damage this way can't play abilities this turn.

name: Goblin Gumbo
rules: Attach to target ally.;Ongoing: Attached ally has -2 ATK.;When Goblin Gumbo enters a graveyard from play, put it from that graveyard on top of its owner's deck.
flavour: It's Landro-licious.

name: Gone Fishin'
rules: Ongoing: 2, [Exhaust] -> Draw three cards and skip your next turn. Use only on your turn.

name: Greed Before Need
rules: Ongoing: You can play equipment cards from other players' graveyards.
flavour: To some, reputations are best used when spent like gold.

name: Guarded by the Light
rules: Prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt to target ally this turn.
flavour: The naaru watch over us all.

name: Hammer of the Righteous
rules: Your hero deals 3 holy damage to target attacker. That damage can't be prevented.
flavour: A hammer, a libram, and the strength of the Light-all necessary, but the hammer is the most fun. - Nimaasus the Implacable

name: Hamstring
rules: Attach to target ally in combat with your hero. ; Ongoing: Attached ally can't ready during its controller's ready step.
flavour: A mechanostrider is no help if you can't stand upright to mount it. - Fillet

name: Heroism
rules: Alliance Hero Required; Heroes and allies in your party have +2 ATK while attacking allies this turn.
flavour: We must bring calm to the troubled elemental spirits of this land. Ma-no icta, my brethren.

name: Holy Fire
rules: Attach to target hero or ally, and your hero deals 2 holy damage to it. That damage can't be prevented. ; Ongoing: At the start of each turn, your hero deals 1 holy damage to attached character. That damage can't be prevented.

name: Immolate
rules: Attach to target hero or ally, and your hero deals 1 fire damage to it.;Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 1 fire damage to attached character.
reprinted: Class Starter Deck 2010,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring),Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall)

name: Incinerate
rules: Your hero deals 2 fire damage to target hero or ally, 4 damage if your hero has dealt fire damage with an ability to that character this turn.
reprinted: Twilight of the Dragons,Class Starter Deck 2010
flavour: If at first you don't succeed, fry and fry again.

name: Intervene
rules: The next time damage would be dealt to target friendly hero or ally this turn, it's dealt to your hero instead.

name: Jackknife
rules: Target up to two heroes and/or allies. Your hero deals 3 melee damage to the first target. If you have a Dagger, your hero deals 3 melee damage to the second target.
flavour: Two blades for the strike of one.

name: Jar Soul
rules: Remove target ally from the game.;Ongoing: Destroy Jar Soul -> You pay 2 less to play your next Pet this turn.
flavour: It does not reflect the face of the viewer, but rather the face of the soul trapped within.

name: Kill Command
rules: Target Pet in your party deals melee damage equal to its ATK to target ally.
flavour: In truth, she needs no order to kill. I only tell her whom to spare.

name: Life Arc
rules: Your hero heals all damage from target friendly ally, then deals that much nature damage to target opposing ally.

name: Lifebloom
rules: Attach to target hero or ally.;Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero heals 1 damage from attached character.;1, Destroy Lifebloom -> Your hero heals 4 damage from attached character.

name: Mana Jade
rules: Ongoing: 2, Destroy Mana Jade -> Draw three cards.
flavour: Typical magecraft, to conjure a thing of such beauty only to sacrifice it. - Raesa Morningstar

name: Mass Dispel
rules: Destroy any number of abilities.
flavour: The bonds of magic shatter like broken glass in the grasp of an experienced priest.

name: Megamorph
rules: Target any number of allies in one party.;Ongoing: Those allies can't attack or protect, lose all powers, and are Sheep.
flavour: The greatest indignity isn't the loss of speech or fighting ability, but the possibility of getting sheared.

name: Mind Soothe
rules: Attach to target ally.;Ongoing: Attached ally can't attack your hero.
flavour: Doctor Herbert Halsey once tested this spell side by side with Rumsey Rum. They both had the same effect. - Deacon Markus Hallow

name: Misdirection
rules: Ongoing: At the start of each opponent's turn, choose an ally in your party. Opposing allies can attack only that ally this turn if able.
flavour: The path of least resistance can be the last of your existence.

name: Molten Armor
rules: Ongoing: 1, Remove an ability card in your graveyard from the game -> If your hero is defending, it deals 1 fire damage to target attacker.
flavour: As if bein' encased in ice wasn't bad enough! How's a rogue to make a living? - Rotun Daggerhand

name: Moonfire
rules: Attach to target hero or ally, and your hero deals 1 arcane damage to it.;Ongoing: At the start of your turn, if Moonfire is in play, your hero deals 1 arcane damage to attached character.;1 -> Put Moonfire into its owner's hand.
flavour: In all other things, moderation.

name: Mutilate
rules: Assassination Hero Required;Your hero deals melee damage to target hero or ally equal to 1 plus the combined ATK of your Daggers.
flavour: Leave nothing the family can identify. - The Assassin's Creed, Chapter 4

name: Pact of Shadow
rules: Ongoing: When an opponent discards a card, your hero deals 3 shadow damage to target hero or ally.
flavour: It is dark business to manipulate another's mind.

name: Pain Suppression
rules: Discipline Hero Required; ; Ongoing: If your hero would be dealt damage, prevent 1 of that damage.
flavour: It's just a flesh wound.

name: Pick Pocket
rules: Name a card, and then target opponent reveals his hand and discards all cards with that name.
flavour: Leeroy?

name: Prowl
rules: Ongoing: Your hero has Stealth while in cat form.;When your hero deals damage, put Prowl into its owner's hand.
flavour: A druid's mimicry of a rogue's stealth is the sincerest form of battery.

name: Rallying Shout
rules: Ongoing: Allies in your party have Protector.
flavour: Defensive positions! Prepare for attack!

name: Rampage
rules: Fury Hero Required;Ongoing: When your hero deals combat damage with a weapon, put a slaughter counter on Rampage.;Your hero has +1 ATK while attacking for each slaughter counter on Rampage.

name: Readiness
rules: Survival Hero Required;You can play ability cards from your graveyard this turn.;If an ability card would enter your graveyard this turn, remove it from the game instead.

name: Redemption
rules: Put target ally card from your graveyard into play if its cost is less than or equal to the number of resources you have. ; Draw a card.
reprinted: Assault on Icecrown Citadel,Class Starter Deck 2010,Fires of Outland (EA),Archive
flavour: The Light conquers even the darkness of death. - Thatia Truthbringer

name: Righteous Defense
rules: Remove target friendly defending ally from combat, and your hero becomes a defender. Opposing heroes and allies can't attack that ally this turn.
flavour: Only a paladin would be foolish enough to run into combat blindly. Then again, only a paladin would be that brave. - Deacon Markus Hallow

name: Seal of Blood
rules: Horde Hero Required; ; Ongoing: When your hero deals combat damage with a weapon to a hero or ally, your hero also deals 2 holy damage to that character and 1 holy damage to itself. ; 1, Destroy Seal of Blood -> Your hero deals 2 holy damage to target hero or ally and 1 holy damage to itself.

name: Seal of Vengeance
rules: Alliance Hero Required; Ongoing: At the end of each turn, your hero deals 1 holy damage to each hero and ally it dealt combat damage to this turn. ; 1, Destroy Seal of Vengeance -> Your hero deals 1 holy damage to each hero and ally it dealt combat damage to this turn.

name: Shadowfury
rules: Destruction Hero Required; Your hero deals 2 shadow damage to each opposing ally. Exhaust each ally dealt damage this way, and it can't ready during its controller's next ready step.

name: Shamanistic Rage
rules: Enhancement Hero Required; Ongoing: When your hero deals combat damage with one or more Melee weapons for the first time each turn, ready up to X of your resources, where X is the combined strike cost of those weapons.

name: Silencing Shot
rules: Marksmanship Hero Required;You may exhaust one of your Ranged weapons rather than pay Silencing Shot's cost.;Your hero deals 2 ranged damage to target hero or ally.;If you targeted a hero, its controller can't play abilities this turn, and you may interrupt an ability card he played.

name: Slow
rules: Arcane Hero Required;Attach to target hero.;Ongoing: Attached hero's controller can't play more than one card per turn. (This doesn't include placing resources.)
flavour: A . . . little . . . help . . . here?

name: Soul Rend
rules: Target opponent puts an ally from his party into its owner's hand. If he does, that opponent discards a card.
flavour: There are things worse than death. Let me show you.

name: Soulshatter
rules: Ongoing: When your hero defends against an ally, that ally's controller exhausts all allies in his party.

name: Spell Reflection
rules: You may exhaust one of your Shields rather than pay Spell Reflection's cost. ; If an ability card is targeting only your hero, change its target to its controller's hero.
flavour: The spell was marked, Return to sender.

name: Strength of Arms
rules: Ongoing: Each of your weapons has +2 ATK. ; Each of your armor has +2 DEF.

name: Surprise Attacks
rules: Combat Hero Required; Ongoing: Your Melee weapons have +1 ATK. ; Combat damage dealt by your hero can't be prevented.
flavour: You need not always be hidden to get the upper hand in a fight. - The Assassin's Creed, Chapter 8

name: Take the Shot
rules: Your hero deals ranged damage to target hero or ally equal to 1 plus the ATK of one of your Ranged weapons.
flavour: The end justifies the means of getting it there.

name: Treasure Chest
rules: Look at the top three cards of your deck. Put one into your hand and the rest on top of your deck in any order.
flavour: OK, everyone. Let's roll on this.

name: Tree of Life
rules: Restoration Hero Required;Ongoing: You pay 1 less to play Restoration abilities, to a minimum of 1.;If damage would be healed from a friendly hero or ally, that much damage +1 is healed instead.;When you play a non-Restoration ability, destroy Tree of Life.

name: Tremor Totem
rules: Ongoing: At the start of each turn, destroy any number of abilities attached to heroes and allies in your party. ;(Totems can be attacked or targeted like allies.)
flavour: It shakes the ground with such force that all manner of spells lose their cohesion.

name: Ultimate Triumph
rules: Destroy target ally.
flavour: In a battle to the death, itâ€™s the last blow-not the first-that matters.

name: Unstable Affliction
rules: Affliction Hero Required; Attach to target hero or ally. ; Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 2 shadow damage to attached character. ; When Unstable Affliction is destroyed, your hero deals 4 shadow damage to attached character.

name: Vampiric Touch
rules: Shadow Hero Required; Attach to target hero or ally. ; Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 1 shadow damage to attached character. ; When you play a Shadow ability, ready one of your resources.

name: Victory Rush
rules: If your hero has dealt fatal combat damage to an ally this turn, destroy another target ally.
flavour: Victory for one means agony for another.

name: Zephyr
rules: Choose one: Your hero deals 1 nature damage to target hero or ally; or your hero heals 1 damage from target hero or ally.
flavour: Nature, when in balance, gives and takes with equal fervor.

name: Andiss Butcherson
rules: You pay 1 less to strike with weapons.
flavour: My advice? Keep your scabbard greased and your blades sharp.

name: Angrida
rules: [Exhaust] -> Angrida deals 2 shadow damage to target ally.
flavour: Don't touch what you can't afford.

name: Archdruid Hamuul Runetotem
rules: Druids in your party have +1 ATK while attacking.;Druids in your party have Protector.

name: Ash'ergi
rules: Stealth (Can't protect against this character.); Ash'ergi has +1 ATK for each damage on him.
flavour: Go ahead, mon. Hit me again.

name: Bitties
rules: At the end of your turn, if Bitties has damage, destroy him.
flavour: You just need to catch him to stop him, but good luck with that whole catching thing. He's more slippery than an Umbrafen eel. - Rotun Daggerhand

name: Borlis Brode
rules: Borlis Brode can't ready during your ready step.
flavour: His hunger knows no limits.

name: Breanna Greenmother
rules: Allies in your party can use activated ([Exhaust]) powers the turn they enter your party.

name: Broan Charges-the-Fight
rules: Ferocity; When Broan Charges-the-Fight enters play, you may ready target ally with cost 2 or less.

name: Caddrick Von Styler
rules: 5, [Exhaust] -> Each player destroys one of his resources.

name: Celee Cogfreeze
rules: When you play an ability, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.
flavour: Sometimes you have to cast the wrong spell at the right time.

name: Chen Stormstout
rules: When Chen Stormstout enters play, say I bring PANDA-MONIUM! and opposing allies can't attack this turn.;3, Say Another round? -> Target ally can't attack this turn.
flavour: Is trouble brewing?

name: Christopher the Devout
rules: Protector; 1, Destroy Christopher -> Target hero or ally has Protector this turn.
flavour: As battle raged around him, Christopher's pre-planned strategies fell to the wayside as his instincts took over.

name: Drusenna the Vigilant
rules: Protector

name: Enfea Contha
rules: [Exhaust] -> Enfea Contha heals all damage from target friendly ally, then deals that much nature damage to target opposing ally.
flavour: Good health. Long life.

name: Erytheis
rules: When Erytheis is destroyed, she deals 1 arcane damage to target hero or ally.
flavour: My friends are dead. My family is dead. Even I am dead. What do I have left to fear?

name: E'sad
rules: When E'sad enters play, target opponent puts the top card of his deck into his resource row face down.

name: Exodar Peacekeepers
rules: When Exodar Peacekeepers enters play, it heals 1 damage from target hero or ally for each ally named Exodar Peacekeepers in your party.
flavour: They are the celebrated warriors and defenders of the draenei.

name: Ez'trin
rules: When Ez'trin enters play, you may exhaust target weapon.

name: Faesha Firestalker
rules: Destroy one of your resources -> Faesha Firestalker has Long-Range this turn.

name: Fugu
rules: [Exhaust] -> Gain control of target ally until end of turn.

name: Gahrunt Foulfang
rules: Remove three ally cards in your graveyard from the game -> Target ally in your party has Ferocity this turn.
flavour: Martyrs instill morale, the damned instill bloodlust.

name: Garell Strout
rules: When Garell Strout attacks, he deals 2 fire damage to target opposing hero.

name: Gor'gar
rules: Gor'gar enters play with an ankh counter. ; While Gor'gar has an ankh counter, when he's destroyed, you may have his owner put him from his graveyard into play, then remove his ankh counter.

name: Guruvan
rules: Long-Range (Defenders deal no combat damage to this character.)
flavour: May the naaru guide my aim.

name: Hailey Goodchilde
rules: [Exhaust] -> Hailey Goodchilde heals all damage from target ally.
flavour: Following in her father's footsteps, Hailey seeks to restore Stormwind to its former glory.

name: He Who Has No Life
rules: When an ally with cost 5 or less enters play, destroy it.
flavour: How do you kill that which has no life?

name: Hukkath
rules: Protector; 1, Destroy Hukkath -> Your hero is Untargetable this turn.
flavour: Send me back.

name: Hurlorn Battlechaser
rules: Long-Range (Defenders deal no combat damage to this character.);When Hurlorn Battlechaser enters play, he deals 2 ranged damage to target hero or ally.

name: Izza Spindleflame
rules: Elusive; At the start of each turn, Izza Spindleflame deals 1 fire damage to each hero.
flavour: Inside every soul there is a fire, begging for release.

name: Jazmin Bloodlove
rules: Ferocity (Can attack immediately.);Protector

name: Jewelcrafter Zanaz
flavour: We who are exiled must forever keep our faith.

name: Jon Reaver
rules: When Jon Reaver enters play, you may destroy target weapon.
flavour: Jon, Jon of Lordaeron - Went for his sword, but his sword was gone. Watch your wares before his gaze. He'll smash your axe in a jealous rage.

name: Josiah King
rules: 5, Destroy Josiah King -> Josiah deals 3 arcane damage to target hero or ally.
flavour: Magic is tied to the fabric of being, so much so that unleashing it is unleashing one's very life force.

name: Jubilee Arcspark
rules: Untargetable;When Jubilee Arcspark is revealed from your deck by a quest, draw a card.
flavour: Jubilee has a knack for turning up in all the right places.

name: Kagella Shadowmark
rules: Kagella Shadowmark has +1 ATK for each exhausted ally in your party.
flavour: When the battle is done, and the mournful come to collect their dead . . . that is when I strike.

name: Karrok Scarrend
flavour: The more, the merrier - Scarrend family motto

name: Kelvor Valorshine
rules: Combat damage dealt by Kelvor Valorshine can't be prevented.
flavour: Power is never deserved; it is taken by those who want it.

name: Kiani De'nara
rules: You may destroy four of your resources rather than pay Kiani De'nara's cost.
flavour: Remember the Sunwell.

name: Krenig Soulguard
rules: 3, Destroy Krenig Soulguard -> Choose one: Destroy target ability; or put target ability into its owner's hand.

name: Kulvo Jadefist
rules: Protector;When Kulvo Jadefist attacks, he has -2 ATK and -2 health this turn.
flavour: Bring the fight to me, and I'll show you a brawl.

name: Lessa the Awakener
rules: When Lessa enters play, you may put an ally card with cost 2 or less from your graveyard into play.

name: Lor'themar Theron
rules: Exhaust a Blood Elf in your party -> Interrupt target ability card.
flavour: The blood elves will endure any hardship, overcome any obstacle, and emerge stronger than before.

name: Magistrix Maelnerana
rules: You may destroy two of your resources rather than pay Magistrix Maelnerana's cost.
flavour: Blood elf magic comes at a high price.

name: Magraff Sparroweye Ironhammer
rules: 1 -> Magraff Sparroweye Ironhammer has Long-Range this turn. (Defenders deal no combat damage to him.)
flavour: Laddie, the best way to avoid an enemy's attack is to be outside its reach.

name: Malistra the Demonmistress
rules: Friendly Pets have +2 ATK.
flavour: A strong mistress can give pets a reason to kill, and a fear of coming back in failure.

name: Manthos the Recently Sewn
rules: Manthos enters play with 3 damage.

name: Marilyn of the Sacred Vows
rules: [Exhaust] -> Prevent all damage that would be dealt to target ally this turn.
flavour: I am the arm of the Light in battle. I know my path. Can you say the same?

name: Miandra
rules: Miandra enters play with a divine shield counter. ; While Miandra has a divine shield counter, prevent all damage that would be dealt to her. When damage is prevented this way, remove her divine shield counter.
flavour: May the Light embrace you.

name: Mordotz
rules: Mordotz has +1 ATK and +1 health for each ability you control attached to opposing heroes and allies.
flavour: When it all goes wrong, it's his name they call.

name: Morlug Soulslaver
rules: When one of your resources is destroyed, Morlug Soulslaver deals 1 shadow damage to target hero.

name: Mustang Sally
rules: 4, Destroy an ally in your party other than Mustang Sally -> Destroy target ally with cost 4 or less.
flavour: Few healers escape her blades.

name: Najan Spiritbinder
rules: Ferocity;When Najan Spiritbinder deals combat damage to a hero, you may destroy target ability.

name: Nala Stalks-the-Night
rules: Ferocity (Can attack immediately.);Stealth (Can't protect against this character.)

name: Nalkas
rules: [Exhaust] -> Nalkas heals 2 damage from each hero and ally in target player's party.
flavour: By Elune's grace, the injured shall be made whole.

name: Nalonae
rules: You may destroy one of your resources rather than pay Nalonae's cost.
flavour: The dark times will pass.

name: Narmak Doomratchet
rules: Elusive; [Exhaust], Put X damage on your hero -> Narmak Doomratchet deals X shadow damage to target ally.

name: Neeka
rules: Elusive; [Exhaust] -> Neeka heals 1 damage from target hero or ally.
flavour: Neeka has fought so long in the battles for Warsong Gulch that she has lost sight of the greater conflicts of Azeroth.

name: Nesmend Darkbreaker
rules: 5, Destroy Nesmend Darkbreaker -> Target ally is Elusive and Untargetable this turn.

name: Nightfire
rules: 2 -> Nightfire has +1 ATK this turn.
flavour: Those who do not gain the dragonhawk's trust soon feel the dragonhawk's wrath.

name: Norrund Grovewalker
rules: Elusive (Can't be attacked.) ;Untargetable
flavour: There are paths that I walk where you cannot follow.

name: One-Thousand-Battles
rules: Protector;At the start of your turn, an opponent chooses one: One-Thousand-Battles can't attack this turn; or One-Thousand-Battles must attack this turn if able.
flavour: Whether his enemies come to him or he charges them, the end result is the same: another battle won.

name: Parren Shadowshot
rules: 1, [Exhaust] -> Target hero or ally has Long-Range this turn. (Defenders deal no combat damage to it.)

name: Porto
rules: Protector; Friendly Totems are Untargetable.

name: Prophet Velen
rules: Exhaust a Draenei in your party -> Prophet Velen deals 1 nature damage to target opposing hero or ally and heals 1 damage from target friendly hero or ally.

name: Ranthus Adler
rules: 1, Destroy Ranthus Adler -> Put target ally into its owner's hand.

name: Rek'gar
rules: Protector;When one of your Totems is destroyed, Rek'gar deals 1 frost damage to target hero or ally.

name: Rodrigo
flavour: When it comes to the world of combat, Rodrigo leads the way.

name: Sal Grimstalker
rules: Stealth (Can't protect against this character.); At the start of your turn, target hero or ally has Stealth this turn.
flavour: The abundant shadows of Ironforge are a blessing to the city's more stealthy denizens.

name: Savina Greysky
rules: Elusive; Savina Greysky has +2 ATK while you control a Form.
flavour: To humbly serve the calling of Cenarius, that is the duty of all children of the forest.

name: Shadowfiend
rules: Ferocity;When Shadowfiend deals combat damage to a hero, ready one of your resources.;At the end of your turn, put Shadowfiend into its owner's hand.

name: Shadowmistress Jezebel Hawke
rules: Friendly Pets have +2 health.

name: Shawn of the Dead
rules: When Shawn of the Dead attacks, you may put an ally card from target opponent's graveyard into play under your control.
flavour: Who died and made him king of the zombies?

name: Shelly
rules: If Shelly would be dealt combat damage, prevent 1 of that damage.
flavour: There's a good reason a defensive strategy is called turtling.

name: Silvermoon Sentinels
rules: When Silvermoon Sentinels enters play, it deals 1 holy damage to each hero for each ally named Silvermoon Sentinels in your party.
flavour: Bal'a dash, malanore.

name: Snarl Hellwind
rules: Destroy an ally in your party other than Snarl Hellwind -> Snarl has +1 ATK this turn.
flavour: All must be sacrificed for the glory of the Horde!

name: Snig Feralsnout
rules: Stealth (Can't protect against this character.);Snig Feralsnout has Ferocity while you control a Form.

name: Spectral Tiger
rules: Alliance: Elusive allies in your party have +1 health.;Horde: Allies with Ferocity in your party have +1 ATK.

name: Sus'vayin
rules: Sus'vayin has Ferocity and Long-Range while more allies are in an opponent's party than in yours.

name: Tempest, Son-of-Storms
rules: When Tempest enters play, ready a hero or ally in your party.

name: Tez Tez the Patchmonger
rules: When Tez Tez enters play, target opposing ally has -3 ATK this turn.
flavour: I share da voodoo wit choo, mon, no charge.

name: Tinkmaster Overspark
rules: At the start of your turn, you may put an equipment card from your graveyard into play.

name: Tomadae the Magnificent
rules: If your hero would deal damage with an ability, it deals that much damage +1 instead.
flavour: By their very being, the draenei lend their inner strength to their allies.

name: Trogun Smith
rules: At the start of your turn, you may exhaust target armor.
flavour: When you find a flaw in your enemy's defenses, waste no time in exploiting the weakness.

name: Tyler Falconbridge
rules: Stealth (Can't protect against this character.);Tyler Falconbridge is a Combo card while in a graveyard.
flavour: Every good rogue leaves his mark upon the world.

name: Ubel Sternbrow
rules: Protector;Ubel Sternbrow can protect himself.
flavour: There's no harm in looking after number one, provided ya don't abandon those that need ya.

name: Uglund Duskrider
rules: Stealth (Can't protect against this character.); When Uglund Duskrider attacks, target hero or ally has Stealth this turn.

name: Unen Rataan
rules: 2, Destroy Unen Rataan -> Ready your hero and all of your weapons.
flavour: I cannot defeat them, but I can buy you time. Do not waste it.

name: Vindicator Borovon
rules: At the start of your turn, you may destroy target equipment.
flavour: His charge from Draenor was made headlong through enemy steel.

name: Vorden the Shadowbringer
rules: When Vorden enters play, destroy any number of allies in your party, then destroy an opposing ally for each ally destroyed this way.

name: Abacus of Violent Odds
rules: When your hero attacks, roll a die.;If it's even, remove your hero from combat.;If it's odd, ready your hero and all of your weapons at the end of this combat.
flavour: Once the prized possession of Pathaleon the Calculator, its odds eventually stacked against him.

name: Aldori Legacy Defender
rules: [Exhaust] -> Target hero or ally has -2 ATK this turn.

name: Band of the Ranger-General
rules: You pay 1 less to strike with weapons for each weapon you have.
flavour: As much a symbol as a treasure, it had been handed down through generations of many great heroes.

name: Burst of Knowledge
rules: 1, Put Burst of Knowledge into its owner's hand -> You pay 2 less to play your next card this turn.
flavour: A little knowledge can be a dangerous thing.

name: Choker of Fluid Thought
rules: [Exhaust] -> Reveal the top card of target player's deck. You may remove that card from the game.

name: Doomplate Legguards
rules: Your weapons have +3 ATK while you have five or more equipment.

name: Elemental Focus Band
rules: 1, [Exhaust], Discard an ability card -> Your hero deals 2 fire damage to target hero or ally.
flavour: The Lords of the Twilight Council possess powerful treasures of the elements.

name: Emerald-Scale Greaves
rules: 2, Destroy Emerald-Scale Greaves -> Ready target friendly ally.

name: Faith Healer's Boots
rules: [Exhaust] -> an ally card from your graveyard into your hand. Use only if your hero healed damage this turn.

name: Gauntlets of Vindication
rules: Your melee weapons have +1 ATK.;If your hero would deal damage with an ability, it deals that much +1 instead.
flavour: The bearer of these gauntlets strikes down foes with righteous fury.

name: Greatsword of Forlorn Visions
rules: When your hero deals combat damage with Greatsword of Forlorn Visions, put a +1 DEF counter on each of your armor.
flavour: Some visions are better left unseen.

name: Hammer of the Grand Crusader
rules: While your hero has no damage, Hammer of the Grand Crusader has +2 ATK and you pay 2 less to strike with it.

name: Latro's Shifting Sword
rules: Your hero has dual wield.;You pay 2 less to strike with other Swords.

name: Mana-Etched Pantaloons
rules: [Exhaust] -> Draw a card. Use only if you have seven or more cards in your hand.
flavour: The subtle hues deceive the onlooker into believing the runes that adorn these pants are only decorative.

name: Master Cannoneer Boots
rules: 2, Destroy Master Cannoneer Boots -> Your hero deals 2 melee damage to target hero or ally.
flavour: Cannon Master Willey's very own.

name: Masterwork Stormhammer
rules: 5, [Exhaust] -> Your hero deals 1 nature damage to each of up to three target heroes and/or allies.
flavour: It is said the greatest weaponsmiths leave a piece of themselves in every weapon they create.

name: Moonstrider Boots
rules: 1, [Exhaust] -> Your hero has Stealth this turn.

name: Pauldrons of the Crimson Flight
rules: At the end of your turn, ready one of your armor.
flavour: Who can deny the majesty of the red dragonflight? - Belnistrasz

name: Predatory Gloves
rules: When Predatory Gloves enters play, target opponent discards a card and you draw a card.
flavour: In nature there is give and take. Predators take, even when the prey refuses to give.

name: Reaver of the Infinites
rules: 15 -> Reaver of the Infinites has +~ ATK this turn.

name: Serpentcrest Life-Staff
rules: 1, Discard a card -> Your hero heals 2 damage from target hero or ally.
flavour: Deep within the Steam Vault, the Mekgineers construct some of the most powerful weapons in Outland.

name: Sky-Hunter Swift Boots
rules: Untargetable

name: Sonic Spear
rules: When your hero deals combat damage with Sonic Spear to a hero, that hero's controller destroys one of his equipment.
flavour: Few have heard the rumblings of Murmur and lived.

name: Spellbreaker's Buckler
rules: 1, [Exhaust], Discard an equipment card -> Interrupt target ability card.

name: Staff of the Ruins
rules: [Exhaust] -> You pay 1 less to play your next ability this turn for each card in your graveyard with the same name as that ability.
flavour: A great part of wisdom is learning from the mistakes of the past.

name: Stellaris
rules: Exhaust an ally in your party -> You pay 1 less the next time you strike with Stellaris this turn.

name: Sunfury Bow of the Phoenix
rules: When you strike with Sunfury Bow of the Phoenix, your hero has Long-Range this combat. (Defenders deal no combat damage to it.);[Exhaust] -> Your hero deals 1 ranged damage to target hero.

name: Sun-Gilded Shouldercaps
rules: When Sun-Gilded Shouldercaps enters play, you may exhaust target ally.

name: Sword of a Thousand Truths
rules: When your hero deals combat damage with Sword of a Thousand Truths to a hero, that hero's controller discards his hand.
flavour: It was foretold that, one day, heroes who could wield the sword might reveal themselves.

name: Telescopic Sharprifle
rules: 1 -> When you strike with Telescopic Sharprifle this turn, your hero has Long-Range this turn. (Defenders deal no combat damage to it.)

name: Timeslicer
rules: Your hero has dual wield. (Can have a second one-handed Melee weapon instead of an Off-Hand equipment. Can strike with a second Melee weapon during the same combat.)

name: Warp Splinter's Thorn
rules: Your hero has dual wield.;1, Destroy one of your Daggers -> Your hero deals 2 damage to target ally.

name: Warpwood Binding
rules: You pay 1 less to strike with Ranged weapons.

name: Cul Rendhoof
rules: 3, Flip Cul Rendhoof -> When target ally in your party is destroyed this turn, its owner puts it from his graveyard into his resource row face down and exhausted.
flavour: The Earth Mother smiles upon you this day.

name: Deacon Markus Hallow
rules: 6, Flip Deacon Markus Hallow -> Gain control of target opposing ally if its controller has no cards in his hand. Use only on your turn.
flavour: The body need not be slain for a priest to exert command over the soul.

name: Exaura the Cryptkeeper
rules: 2, Flip Exaura -> Remove two target ally cards in one graveyard from the game. Draw a card. Use only on your turn.
flavour: Just because your allies are dead, doesn't mean they're useless.

name: Fillet, Kneecapper Extraordinaire
rules: 3, Flip Fillet -> Allies in your party have +1 ATK this turn.
flavour: My size is a disadvantage, eh? Do you think the enemy stands on their arms or something?

name: Harrigan Soulsunder
rules: 2, Flip Harrigan Soulsunder -> Harrigan deals 1 shadow damage to each opposing hero and ally for each ability attached to that character.
flavour: Taste the bitterness of your own mortality.

name: Indalamar
rules: 3, Flip Indalamar -> Heroes and allies in your party have Protector this turn.
flavour: I bring da pain!

name: Kana Nassis
rules: 2, Flip Kana Nassis -> If Kana is defending, remove her from combat.
flavour: Draenor is but a memory for me now. Azeroth is my new wilderness.

name: Mazar
rules: 3, Flip Mazar, remove a Pet card in your graveyard from the game -> Destroy target ally. Use only on your turn.
flavour: Many authorities on fel magic have thoroughly calculated that it will ultimately consume all who attempt to master it. Until that day arrives, though - woohoo!

name: Moala Stonebinder
rules: 2, Flip Moala Stonebinder -> Your weapons can't be destroyed this turn.
flavour: The Broken have taught me that nothing is beyond saving.

name: Mojo Shaper Ojo'mon
rules: 4, Mojo Shaper Ojo'mon -> Put an ally card with cost 2 or less from your graveyard into play. Use only on your turn.
flavour: Ojo got mojo to sho' joo.

name: Nathadan
rules: 3, Flip Nathadan -> If target ally in your party is defending, remove it from combat.
flavour: I do not serve the Light. The Light serves me.

name: Ona Skyshot
rules: 2, Flip Ona Skyshot -> Ready target Ranged weapon.
flavour: The best offense? The best defense? Frankly, I'd like both at my disposal.

name: Ozzati
rules: 4, Flip Ozzati -> Ozzati deals 1 fire damage to each opposing hero and ally. Use only on your turn.
flavour: Let their souls be cleansed in the searing light of the naaru.

name: Raesa Morningstar
rules: 2, Flip Raesa Morningstar -> Put target ability into its owner's hand. Use only on your turn.
flavour: The Light sustains us, and it will ease even the heaviest of burdens. To think it has abandoned us is pure folly.

name: Rotun Daggerhand
rules: 3, Flip Rotun Daggerhand -> Rotun deals 1 melee damage to target hero or ally. That damage counts as combat damage.
flavour: My father always said, 'A blade with blood not yet tasted is a blade that has surely been wasted.' He was a better rogue than a poet.

name: Thatia Truthbringer
rules: 4, Flip Thatia Truthbringer -> Choose one: Thatia heals 4 damage from target hero or ally; or prevent the next 4 damage that would be dealt to target hero or ally this turn.
flavour: Take heart, for the Light does not heal the unworthy. Now, had you listened to me to begin with, friendâ€¦

name: Yanna Dai'shalan
rules: 3, Flip Yanna Dai'shalan -> Yanna deals 1 nature damage to target ally for each ally in your party. Use only on your turn.
flavour: Nature has many allies. You shall not prevail against all of them.

name: Zomm Hopeslayer
rules: X, Flip Zomm Hopeslayer Put X Combo cards from your removed from game zone into your graveyard.
flavour: So much killing. So little time.

name: A Donation of Mageweave
rules: Pay 3 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw three cards, then discard three cards.

name: Brother Against Brother
rules: While you control three or more abilities, pay 1 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card.
flavour: In time, Syth had me cast out of the Halls, but he refused to let me take our sister Lakka with me. Will you help me rescue her? - Isfar

name: Corki's Ransom
rules: Put Corki's Ransom into its owner's hand and pay 2 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card.
flavour: It says that they have Corki and if we don't cooperate, they're going to eat him. - Arechron

name: Gahz'ridian
rules: Pay 5 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw two cards.
flavour: I even invented a detector that makes finding the Gahz'ridian a snap! Just put it on, and the search begins! - Marvon Rivetseeker

name: In Case of Emergency
rules: Pay 10 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card for each other quest you have.

name: Kodo Roundup
rules: Exhaust an ally in your party and pay 2 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card.
flavour: The caravan owner Cork, Rigger, and I entered a partnership. - Smeed Scrabblescrew

name: Leader of the Bloodscale
rules: While an ally with cost 5 or more is in your party, pay 1 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card.
flavour: A bounty is hereby declared by the Cenarion Expedition on Rajis Fyashe, leader of the Bloodscale naga.

name: Lost!
rules: During your turn, pay 3 to complete this quest.;Reward: Put a unique Goblin ally token named Ringo into play with 0 ATK, 1 health, and At the start of your turn, draw a card.
flavour: My friend, Ringo, left earlier to explore the volcano to the south of here, and he has been gone way too long. - Spraggle Frock

name: One Draenei's Junk
rules: Pay 2 to complete this quest.;Reward: Reveal the top three cards of your deck.;Put a revealed card with cost 1, 2, or 3 into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck.

name: Standards and Practices
rules: While more allies are in an opponent's party than in your, pay 2 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card.
flavour: If you're venturing into the Burning Blade Ruins, I have a task for you. Take these Mag'har battle standards and place them at three distinct locations in the ogre compound. - Elkay'gan

name: Swift Discipline
rules: During your turn, pay 1 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card, and target opponent puts a Boar ally token with 1 ATK and 1 health into play.
flavour: Now I want you to go back to my two dimwitted students and discipline them using this wand. - Instructor Antheol

name: The Fare of Lar'korwi
rules: Pay 3 to complete this quest.;Reward: Ally cards in your hand are instant this turn until you play an ally.

name: The Flawless Flame
rules: Pay 2 to complete this quest.;Reward: Target ally can't protect this turn.

name: The Ultimate Bloodsport
rules: Pay 2 to complete this quest.;Reward: If you have no other quests, draw a card.

name: Timbermaw Ally
rules: Remove three ability cards in your graveyard from the game and pay 1 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card.
flavour: Drive back the corrupted Deadwood tribe of Felwood and we may one day consider you an ally. - Grazle

name: To Serve Kum'isha
rules: Pay 2 to complete this quest.;Reward: Reveal the top three cards of your deck. Put a revealed card with cost of 3 or more into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck.
flavour: Draenei have spent lifetimes in search of just one of these crystals, only to meet horrible fates, their purpose unfulfilled. - Kum'isha

name: Totem of Coo
rules: Pay 3 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card, then draw another card for each other quest named Totem of Coo you have.
flavour: Slowly, words start to form in your head. You think that the totem is telling you to go up the nearby hill, to the northeast.

name: Voidwalkers Gone Wild
rules: If your hero dealt combat damage to an ally this turn, pay 1 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card.
flavour: To the south of us is an area of broken land called the Warp Fields. It's full of rogue and uncontrolled voidwalkers, but I like to think of them as walking batteries. - Screed Luckheed

name: What's Wrong at Cenarion Thicket?
rules: During your turn, pay 1 to complete this quest.;Reward: You and target opponent each draw a card.
flavour: We haven't heard from the druids at the Cenarion Thicket of Terokkar Forest in quite some time. - Lethyn Moonfire

name: When Smokey Sings, I Get Violent
rules: During your turn, destroy When Smokey Sings, I Get Violent and pay 5 to complete this quest.;Reward: Target opponent destroys one of his resources.
flavour: I'm going to give you ten sticks of my special compound. You're going to take them over to Plaguewood and plant them inside the Scourge structures that I've had marked for detonation. - Smokey LaRue

name: Silencing Shot
rules: Marksmanship Hero Required;You may exhaust one of your Ranged weapons rather than pay Silencing Shot's cost.;Your hero deals 2 ranged damage to target hero or ally.;If you targeted a hero, its controller can't play abilities this turn, and you may interrupt an ability card he played.

name: Shadowfiend
rules: Ferocity;When Shadowfiend deals combat damage to a hero, ready one of your resources.;At the end of your turn, put Shadowfiend into its owner's hand.

name: Redemption
rules: Put target ally card from your graveyard into play if its cost is less than or equal to the number of resources you have. ; Draw a card.
reprinted: Fires of Outland,Assault on Icecrown Citadel,Class Starter Deck 2010,Archive
flavour: The Light conquers even the darkness of death. - Thatia Truthbringer

name: Leader of the Bloodscale
rules: While an ally with cost 5 or more is in your party, pay 1 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card.
flavour: A bounty is hereby declared by the Cenarion Expedition on Rajis Fyashe, leader of the Bloodscale naga.

name: Latro's Shifting Sword
rules: Your hero has dual wield.;You pay 2 less to strike with other Swords.

name: Kulvo Jadefist
rules: Protector;When Kulvo Jadefist attacks, he has -2 ATK and -2 health this turn.
flavour: Bring the fight to me, and I'll show you a brawl.

name: Kiani De'nara
rules: You may destroy four of your resources rather than pay Kiani De'nara's cost.
flavour: Remember the Sunwell.

name: Jon Reaver
rules: When Jon Reaver enters play, you may destroy target weapon.
flavour: Jon, Jon of Lordaeron - Went for his sword, but his sword was gone. Watch your wares before his gaze. He'll smash your axe in a jealous rage.

name: Jackknife
rules: Target up to two heroes and/or allies. Your hero deals 3 melee damage to the first target. If you have a Dagger, your hero deals 3 melee damage to the second target.
flavour: Two blades for the strike of one.

name: Hurlorn Battlechaser
rules: Long-Range (Defenders deal no combat damage to this character.);When Hurlorn Battlechaser enters play, he deals 2 ranged damage to target hero or ally.

name: Gone Fishin'
rules: Ongoing: 2, [Exhaust] -> Draw three cards and skip your next turn. Use only on your turn.

name: Goblin Gumbo
rules: Attach to target ally.;Ongoing: Attached ally has -2 ATK.;When Goblin Gumbo enters a graveyard from play, put it from that graveyard on top of its owner's deck.
flavour: It's Landro-licious.

name: Force of Nature
rules: Balance Hero Required;Put three Treant ally tokens with 1 ATK, 1 health, and Ferocity into play.
flavour: They are the fruit sprung from the seeds of service to nature.

name: Fire Elemental Totem
rules: Ongoing: When Fire Elemental Totem enters play, put a Fire Elemental ally token with 2 ATK, 1 health, and Ferocity into play. ; (Totems can be attacked or targeted like allies.)

name: Earth Shock
rules: Your hero deals 4 nature damage to target hero or ally. If you targeted a hero, you may interrupt an ability card played by its controller.
flavour: Concussion beats concentration.

name: Broan Charges-the-Fight
rules: Ferocity; When Broan Charges-the-Fight enters play, you may ready target ally with cost 2 or less.

name: Breanna Greenmother
rules: Allies in your party can use activated ([Exhaust]) powers the turn they enter your party.

name: Andiss Butcherson
rules: You pay 1 less to strike with weapons.
flavour: My advice? Keep your scabbard greased and your blades sharp.

name: Spectral Tiger
rules: Alliance: Elusive allies in your party have +1 health.;Horde: Allies with Ferocity in your party have +1 ATK.

name: Stellaris
rules: Exhaust an ally in your party -> You pay 1 less the next time you strike with Stellaris this turn.

name: Surprise Attacks
rules: Combat Hero Required; Ongoing: Your Melee weapons have +1 ATK. ; Combat damage dealt by your hero can't be prevented.
flavour: You need not always be hidden to get the upper hand in a fight. - The Assassin's Creed, Chapter 8

name: Tempest, Son-of-Storms
rules: When Tempest enters play, ready a hero or ally in your party.

name: Unen Rataan
rules: 2, Destroy Unen Rataan -> Ready your hero and all of your weapons.
flavour: I cannot defeat them, but I can buy you time. Do not waste it.

name: Vorden the Shadowbringer
rules: When Vorden enters play, destroy any number of allies in your party, then destroy an opposing ally for each ally destroyed this way.

name: Warp Splinter's Thorn
rules: Your hero has dual wield.;1, Destroy one of your Daggers -> Your hero deals 2 damage to target ally.

name: Avenger's Shield
rules: Protection Hero Required;Exhaust up to three target heroes and/or allies, and each of them can't ready during its controller's next step. Your hero deals 1 holy damage to each of those characters.
